WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device so that you can see which of your friends are already using WeChat. If any of your contacts are not using WeChat, you can choose to have WeChat send an invitation to join via SMS. Please only select contacts you know will want to receive an invitation. We will handle your contact information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device so that you can see which of your friends are already using WeChat. We will handle your contact information in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
WeChat will access the contacts stored on your device. Your contacts data will be encrypted.
When you tap OK, we will send one SMS to each of the friends that you have selected. Please note that we are contacting such friends only on your behalf and you consent to us making such contact.
We will send friend requests to friends that you have selected.

"The price you will pay for your purchase is a fixed price denominated in Renminbi, the currency of the People's Republic of China (\"RMB\").

You have not been informed of the actual RMB price for your purchase. Instead, you have been informed of an approximate value in US dollars (\"USD\") of the actual RMB price. The approximate USD price uses historical, not real-time, currency exchange rates.

The bank card you will use to pay for your purchase is unlikely to be denominated in RMB.

You will not be charged the approximate USD price for your purchase. The amount you will be charged will be your local currency equivalent (as determined by your bank card issuer) of the actual RMB price.

Your bank card issuer may also charge you other fees for you making a purchase in RMB rather than your local currency.

For further details, please click here ."
